Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The application ID of the application producing the record.
Columns.Name: ApplicationId

Columns.Description: The ID of the stage associated with the task.
Columns.Name: StageId

Columns.Description: The ID of the task.
Columns.Name: TaskId

Columns.Description: The ID of task attempt.
Columns.Name: AttemptId

Columns.Description: The ID executor.
Columns.Name: ExecutorId

Columns.Description: The time (UTC) the task was launched.
Columns.Name: LaunchTime

Columns.Description: The time (UTC) the task finished.
Columns.Name: FinishTime

Columns.Description: Boolean describing whether the task failed.
Columns.Name: Failed

Columns.Description: Boolean describing whether the task was killed.
Columns.Name: Killed

Columns.Description: Reason why the task ended.
Columns.Name: EndReason

Columns.Description: The task type.
Columns.Name: TaskType

Columns.Description: The number of disk bytes spilled.
Columns.Name: DiskBytesSpilled

Columns.Description: The CPU time consumed by the task executor.
Columns.Name: ExecutorCPUTime

Columns.Description: The CPU time the task executor spent deserializing.
Columns.Name: ExecutorDeserializeCPUTime

Columns.Description: The time the task executor spent deserializing.
Columns.Name: ExecutorDeserializeTime

Columns.Description: The time task executor spent running.
Columns.Name: ExecutorRunTime

Columns.Description: The time the JVM spent garbage collecting.
Columns.Name: JvmGcTime

Columns.Description: The bytes of memory spilled.
Columns.Name: MemoryBytesSpilled

Columns.Description: The serialization time spent while getting the result.
Columns.Name: ResultSerializationTime

Columns.Description: Size of the result.
Columns.Name: ResultSize

Columns.Description: The metrics associated with shuffle reads.
Columns.Name: ShuffleReadMetrics

Columns.Description: The metrics associated with shuffle writes.
Columns.Name: ShuffleWriteMetrics

Columns.Description: The metrics associated with the task input.
Columns.Name: InputMetrics

Columns.Description: The metrics associated with the task output.
Columns.Name: OutputMetrics

Columns.Description: The number of updated blocks.
Columns.Name: UpdatedBlocks

Columns.Description: The peak amount of memory used during execution.
Columns.Name: PeakExecutionMemory

Columns.Description: The amount of delay the scheduler experienced.
Columns.Name: SchedulerDelay

Columns.Description: The number of records read during the task.
Columns.Name: RecordsRead

Columns.Description: The number bytes read during the task.
Columns.Name: BytesRead

Columns.Description: The number of records written by the task.
Columns.Name: RecordsWritten

Columns.Description: The number of bytes written by the task.
Columns.Name: BytesWritten

Columns.Description: The time spent waitng for fetching.
Columns.Name: ShuffleFetchWaitTime

Columns.Description: The number bytes read during the shuffle task.
Columns.Name: ShuffleTotalBytesRead

Columns.Description: The number of blocks fethced during the shuffle task.
Columns.Name: ShuffleTotalBlocksFetched

Columns.Description: The number of local blocks fethced during the shuffle task.
Columns.Name: ShuffleLocalBlocksFetched

Columns.Description: The number of remote blocks fethced during the shuffle task.
Columns.Name: ShuffleRemoteBlocksFetched

Columns.Description: The time spent writing during the shuffle task.
Columns.Name: ShuffleWriteTime

Columns.Description: The bytes written during the shuffle task.
Columns.Name: ShuffleBytesWritten

Columns.Description: The number of records written during the shuffle task.
Columns.Name: ShuffleRecordsWritten

Columns.Description: The number updated block statuses during the task.
Columns.Name: NumUpdatedBlockStatuses

Columns.Description: The tenant ID of the cluster running the task.
Columns.Name: ClusterTenantId

Columns.Description: The type of node running the task.
Columns.Name: Role

Columns.Description: The FQDN of the host running the task.
Columns.Name: Host

Columns.Description: The DNS name of the cluster running the task.
Columns.Name: ClusterDnsName

Columns.Description: The region of the cluster running the task.
Columns.Name: Region

Columns.Description: The IP Address of the node running the task.
Columns.Name: IpAddress

Columns.Description: The subscription ID of the cluster running the task
Columns.Name: UserSubscriptionId

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
